item.title: Making an animated ggplot
item.description: I decide to talk about how I make my awesome blog banner in this first post. ðŸ˜„ Why this banner ? Itâ€™s a french wordplay with my family name Sauder => Saut dâ€™R (R jump in english). Thatâ€™s why I decided to make a banner with the R-logo jumping on some (so cool) stickers. I choose stickers of packages that I use to do this animated ggplot. Which packages ?
